body:
## Urgent queries

If your query is urgent, phone:

* 0300 123 1072 for [probate enquiries](https://www.find-court-tribunal.service.gov.uk/courts/probate-service-centre)
* 0300 303 0642 for [divorce enquiries](https://www.find-court-tribunal.service.gov.uk/courts/divorce-service-centre)
* 0300 123 1372 for [court claims for money](https://www.find-court-tribunal.service.gov.uk/courts/county-court-money-claims-centre-ccmcc)

Our call centres are open 8am to 4pm.

components.html: Calls to these numbers cost up to 10p per minute from landlines and between 3p and 40p per minute from mobiles, depending on your provider.

heading: Contact HMCTS
lede: Use this form to contact HMCTS about a probate or divorce application, or about a court claim for money
